aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.textOne: We are an experienced design studio that creates websites and mobile applications for companies across various industries. We specialize in modern landing pages, online stores, and marketing content that help brands stand out in the digital world, with a strong focus on SEO and Google ranking.
aboutUs.textTwo: We execute every project with great attention to detail, combining modern design with technology. We create websites and applications that are visually appealing, business-effective, and easy to use. Thanks to our experience, we merge aesthetics with functionality, enhancing brand recognition and delivering a positive user experience.

oferSection.title: Services
oferSection.text: The cost of creating a website depends on many factors — including project complexity, graphic design, number of subpages, content, and additional functionalities. Each project is priced individually after analyzing the client’s needs and expectations. Schedule a free consultation with us, and we will prepare a quote for your website tailored to your budget and business goals.

Optimisation.info: Optimization of the client's existing website to increase its speed and performance, as well as expanding it with new functionalities tailored to business needs.

Redesign.info: Redesign of the client's existing website in accordance with modern design, usability, and SEO standards. We update the website’s appearance, improve navigation, adapt it for mobile devices, and implement solutions that increase conversion rates.

Copywriting.info: A key element of every website. Well-prepared and thoughtfully crafted content increases conversions, builds trust in the company, product, or service, and supports positioning in Google and other search engines.

Content.info: That is, photos, graphics, videos, and multimedia that build the brand image. Consistent and valuable content attracts user attention, increases engagement, improves visibility on Google, and supports the sale of products and services.

SEO.info: It is the process of adapting a website to meet search engine requirements to achieve higher rankings on Google. It includes keyword analysis, improving site structure, content optimization, loading speed, and internal linking. Effective SEO optimization makes your site more visible, attracts more users, and increases the chances of conversion.

Support.info: Website technical support ensures its smooth and secure operation. It includes regular updates, performance monitoring, protection against failures and cyber threats, and quick response to technical issues. This ensures your website operates reliably, is always accessible to users, and supports the achievement of business goals.

expiriance.title: Experience and professionalism
expiriance.text: We create websites and applications for companies in various industries. Always maintain constant contact with the client before, during, and after the completion of the project..

support.title: Turnkey solution
support.text: We provide full support — from graphic design, content and copy, to SEO and technical maintenance.

privatePolicy.text:
Light Street Web Studio processes personal data in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and applicable Ukrainian law.
When you contact us through the website, we may receive your name, email address, phone number or any information you choose to provide in a message or project request.
The website also automatically collects technical data such as IP address, browser information, cookies and analytics metrics.
This technical processing is carried out based on our legitimate interest under Article 6(1)(f) GDPR to ensure the website's proper functioning and improve its performance.
The data you send intentionally is used to respond to your inquiries, provide consultations, estimate projects and fulfill contractual obligations.
This processing is necessary for the performance of a contract or steps needed before entering into one, as outlined in Article 6(1)(b) GDPR.
If you agree to receive marketing messages, such processing relies solely on your consent according to Article 6(1)(a) GDPR, which you may withdraw at any time, as permitted by Article 7(3).
We may share your data with trusted service providers such as hosting companies, analytics services or project subcontractors.
All such partners act only on our instructions and are bound by Article 28 GDPR as data processors.
If international data transfers occur outside the European Union, we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses under Article 46(2)(c) GDPR or transfer data only to countries recognized by the European Commission as providing an adequate level of protection in line with Article 45.
We retain personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, following the storage limitation principle established in Article 5(1)(e) GDPR.
You have the right to access your personal data, request correction or deletion, restrict or object to processing, and receive your data in a portable format.
These rights are guaranteed by Articles 15–21 GDPR.
For any privacy-related questions, please contact us at privacy@lightstreet.com.
